##### Remark(ML estimation)
If the dispersion parameter is unknown, its ML estimate, $\hat\phi$ may be obtained as a solution to the equation

$$
0 &=&\frac{dL}{d\phi}\Big|_{\beta=\hat\beta}\\
  &=&
$$
